mapper.select: select qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent, to_char(qnaWritedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') as qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory from soqna order by qnaNum asc
select qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent, to_char(qnaWritedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') as qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory from soqna where qnaComplete=#{searchName} order by qnaNum asc

select qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent, to_char(qnaWritedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') as qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory from soqna
where qnaComplete=#{searchName} and (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=7
where qnaComplete=#{searchName} and (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=30
order by qnaNum asc

select qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent, to_char(qnaWritedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') as qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory from soqna
where (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=7
where (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=30
order by qnaNum asc

select count(*) from soqna
where (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=7
where (sysdate-qnaWritedate)<=30

mapper.insert: insert into soqna (qnaNum, soId, qnaTitle , qnaContent,qnaWritedate,qnaComplete,qnaCategory) values(SEQ_noticetoso_noticeNum.NEXTVAL, #{soId},#{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent},default,default,#{qnaCategory})
mapper.delete: delete from soqna where soId=#{soId} and qnaNum=#{qnaNum}
